segments.text: I see the kitchen, and my eyes are immediately drawn to the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just sheeting over the front, onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a really wide puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Honestly, it's quite a mess; the water will surely damage the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely unaware, still polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, but her face shows no recognition of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the cold water on her skin yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect really grates on me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of all that wasted water is also bothering me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR
